title: My champion shards?
body:
Do I want to keep 2 more champion shards of each champion I own and m7 all of them eventually but maybe not ever? Or do I want 90 BE or something slightly more?? I don't know if this is General Discussion or not but idk if I should be that patient even though I think I own all of the champions I want to play.

Maybe I'm just being too careful with my blue essence, I bet most people sell all of their champion shards regardless anyways but I still can't decide
